author: vargasa
body:
Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/25072

* This has been build on top of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/25139

Please note that commits: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/25072/commits/e7ccffaebc74eded01f9d313f834a3f27c6ef469, https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/25072/commits/8c61b57e909e70969222dfd59d6ade6d45d026d5, and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/25072/commits/84d970869f4a9da395db725de112d2e55c6b9b24 were not included as it is better not to touch the file structure of the release as twiki documentation may relay on it

For details please check:
* https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/24b5920d0dd9603af9b8f27a648d9fec7a368c6f#r31034588
* https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/25072
title: Validation/Geometry: Tracker/HGCal Material Budget 'Other' Category fix [Backport]
